channel.title: Phoenix 718 || ECO || Drygogres! || Need Staff! || SKILLING! || LEVEL POINTS!
channel.description:
[center] Phoenix - SemiSpawn/PK hosted on a dedi!
Download - [url=http://phoenixrsps.com/client.jar]http://phoenixrsps.com/client.jar[/url] Website - [url=http://phoenixrsps.com]http://phoenixrsps.com[/url] Armadyl Bandos Saradomin Zamorak Nex Tormented Demons Glacors Balance Elemental Corporeal Beast Giant Mole Bork Polypore Dungeon Slayer Tower Dagganoth Kings King Black Dragon Ice Strykewyrms Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Green Dragons BarrelChest Nomad Fight Caves Fight Kiln Vote store in-game Daily Spins ( works proxys don't work) Loyalty Point shop PvP points shop Crystal key chest Repairing items 2 MiniQuests Plank making Zombies Daily challenges with rewards. Nex added (NEW) Dominion rewards Wilderness Agility course Fully working lobby (credits to sean) Slayer
Minigames: Clanwars Duel arena Pest Control (NEW) Castle Wars Fight pits Fight Kiln Fight caves Crucible Troll invasion Dominion Tower Barbarian Assault Barrows TrollInvasion Falconry RecipeForDisaster Trivia
Bosses: Party Demon Giant Mole Corp beast Nex Godwars Bosses Queen black dragon Kalphite Queen Tormented demons Dagannoth Dungeon (Need the right gfx) Glacors (Need the righ gfx) Living Rock caverns Warriors Guild Pot Decanting Revenants
More to come...
Media [ Le tour de Phoenix] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MYuPW2v.png[/img] Welcome! [img]http://i.imgur.com/pkvVUt0.png[/img] Amazing Community! [img]http://i.imgur.com/0PQFEub.png[/img] Customize game however you would like to, choosing from 3 different classes.. [img]http://i.imgur.com/QbxSmfS.png[/img] 3 Different Classes... [img]http://i.imgur.com/7MZiNGK.png[/img] Magic class, love magic skill! :-) [img]http://i.imgur.com/yeZD14w.png[/img] PK zone around the world!, excluding the skilling places... [img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/7618/3ais.png[/img] Oh.. Damn... Well... it aint ruining the eco, SEMI-SPAWN/PK FTW! [img]http://i.imgur.com/p6SpXdr.png[/img] SET TITLE!!! for donors + ;/ GL next time :-)
[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/5863/l4y6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0CYuTGM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gzubT9t.png[/img] PKPoint Shop 1! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1h7Rrnx.png[/img] PKPoint Shop 2! [img]http://i.imgur.com/1wJTkFl.png[/img] Pk Point Shop 3! [img]http://i.imgur.com/BRUrJ0N.png[/img] Pk Point Shop 4! [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/6819/kgap.png[/img] Credits to Matrix! [img]http://i.imgur.com/RKke308.png[/img] Change your yell colour! [img]http://i.imgur.com/qApxOA3.png[/img] SOF (+2) Everyday ! [img]http://i.imgur.com/LqO2WNq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7T1Jlp9.png[/img] Skill Instantly! [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/5677/fxzj.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AJezLA9.png[/img] Responsive Website! [img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/6113/smw4.png[/img] New Home [img]http://i.imgur.com/Qqx0DBh.png[/img]
[img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/8393/uwp.png[/img] [B][U][18/08/2013][/U][/B] Server has got many updates:
HighScores Auto Donation Auto Vote Vbulletin Forums Added Drygogres New Home Removed Semi Spawn ECO economic PK except all the training areas etc Added in Training areas! Demoted Staff Members that weren't active added veteran rank! Working Grand Exchange! Better Donator Zone! And alot more content![/B][/COLOR]
[/center]

item.title: Phoenix 718 || ECO || Drygogres! || Need Staff! || SKILLING! || LEVEL POINTS!

item.description:
@Trisidia wrote:

[b][b][18/08/2013]
Server has got many updates:

HighScores
Auto Donation
Auto Vote
Vbulletin Forums
Added Drygogres
New Home
Removed Semi Spawn
ECO economic
PK except all the training areas etc
Added in Training areas!
Demoted Staff Members that were’nt active
added veteran rank!
Working Grand Exchange!
Better Donator Zone!
And alot more content!

And Site has been fixed![/b][/b]
